code: import{Card,Rating,Typography}from'@mui/material';import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var MenuItem=function MenuItem(_ref){var item=_ref.item;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{variant:"outlined",sx:{borderRadius:'15px'},className:"MenuSingleCard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image,alt:item.name,loading:"lazy"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{component:"div",variant:"h6",children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Rating,{value:4.5,precision:0.5,size:"small"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{component:"p",children:item.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{className:"card-price",variant:"h6",component:"div",children:["$ ",item.price]})]});};export default MenuItem;

sourcesContent: import { Card, Rating, Typography } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' const MenuItem = ({item}) => { return ( {item.name} {item.description} $ {item.price} ) } export default MenuItem
